    • Method Detail

      • createLocalFSBlobStore

        protected org.apache.jackrabbit.core.persistence.bundle.BundleDbPersistenceManager.CloseableBLOBStore createLocalFSBlobStore(org.apache.jackrabbit.core.persistence.PMContext context)
                                                                                                                      throws Exception
        Creates a blob store that is based on a local fs. This is called by init if BundleDbPersistenceManager.useLocalFsBlobStore() returns true. If useSharedFsBlobStore is true, then the store will be in a shared location.
        Overrides:
        createLocalFSBlobStore in class org.apache.jackrabbit.core.persistence.bundle.BundleDbPersistenceManager
        Parameters:
        context - the persistence manager context
        Returns:
        a blob store
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs.
